## Matrix.scaleToRef() method

Scale the current matrix values by a factor to a given result matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleToRef(scale: number, result: Matrix): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the matrix to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current matrix
